72.title: Adding “sexual orientation” and “gender identity” to the categories covered by the Human Rights Act
72.description: The purpose of this bill is to add “sexual orientation” and “gender identity” to the categories covered by the Human Rights Act, prohibiting discrimination in employment and places of public accommodation. The bill adds “age”, “sexual orientation” and “gender identity” to the categories covered by the Fair Housing Act prohibiting discrimination in housing. The bill defines “sexual orientation” and “gender identity”.

733.title: Relating to unlawful discriminatory practices in categories covered by the Human Rights Act and the Fair Housing Act
733.description: The purpose of this bill is to add “sexual orientation” and “gender identity” to the categories covered by the Human Rights Act, prohibiting discrimination in employment and places of public accommodation. The bill adds “age”, “sexual orientation” and “gender identity” to the categories covered by the Fair Housing Act prohibiting discrimination in housing. The bill defines “sexual orientation” and “gender identity”.

975.last_action: To House Health and Human Resources
975.title: Relating to therapeutic rights of minors
975.description: The purpose of this bill is to provide therapeutic rights to minors with regard to treatment by licensed therapists intended to change the sexual attractions or sexual behaviors of minors, or the self-declared gender identity minors.

1116.title: Prohibiting civil rights violations based on disability, gender identity or sexual orientation
1116.description: The purpose of this bill is to prohibit civil rights violations based on disability gender identity, or sexual orientation. The bill provides that evidence of constitutionally protected speech or associations is not admissible in criminal prosecutions except in certain situations. The bill provides for sentencing alternatives for persons convicted of violations. And, the amendments to this section are to be known asÂ “Angel’s Law”.

1439.title: Prohibiting civil rights violations based on gender identity or sexual orientation
1439.description: Prohibiting civil rights violations based on gender identity or sexual orientation
